text:
January 2, 1953
Dr. Burton Paulu, President
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
Radio Station KUOM
University of Minnesota
Minneapolis 14, Minnesota
Dear Burton:
Whatever you decide or have decided on
Schooley and committees Is all right with me. I
did have, and do have, one suggestion, which I had
Intended to mention earlier via Skornla or Hill,
tout didn't get to It. I had thought perhaps someone
else could serve as membership chairman—get my
name off as chairman. Could still serve. If it Is
too late, let »er go.
Sincerely,
Frank I. Schooley
FES f to
cc Skornia
McBride
